@JSon:$.title
<js>
result.replace(/[（［【\[\{\(].*?[更合字修费求票赏鲜盟推歉谢祝节年].*?[）］】\]\}\)]$/,"").replace(/^(\S+\h)?第?(\d{3,4})(、|\.|\s|$)/,"第$2章 ").replace(/\S+\s(第(\d{1,4}|[一二三四五六七八九十百千]{1,7})[章节话回折]|(内容)?简介|卷首语|楔子|前言|序[言章]?|终章|后记|附录)/,"$1")

ruleFindUrl:
<js>
tmp=java.ajax("http://api.zhuishushenqi.com/ranking/gender");
tmp=JSON.parse(tmp);
cate=java.ajax("http://api.zhuishushenqi.com/cats/lv2");
cate=JSON.parse(cate);
result="";
function f(a,b) {
	var x="";y=tmp[a];
	for (i in y) 
{x+=b+y[i].shortTitle+"::/ranking/"+y[i]._id+"&&";}
	result +=x;
	};
function ff(a,b) {
	var x="";y=cate[a];u1="::/book/by-categories?gender=";u2="&type=hot&start={{(searchPage-1)*50}}&limit=50&&"
	for (i in y) {
x+=b+y[i].major+u1+a+"&major="+y[i].major+u2;
		for (j in y[i].mins) {x+=b+y[i].major+"/"+y[i].mins[j]+u1+a+"&major="+y[i].major+"&minor="+y[i].mins[j]+u2;}
	};result +=x;
	};
f("male","[男]");f("female","[女]");f("epub","[出版]");
ff("male","[男]");ff("female","[女]");ff("press","[出版]");
String(result);
</js>

ruleChapterList:
<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result).data;
var pageSize = data.comments.length;
var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total/pageSize) || 1; // NaN
var list = Array.from(Array(pageCount).keys());
for(var i = 0; i < list.length; i++){
  var index = list[i]+1;
  list[i] = {title:'第' + index + '页', url: baseUrl.split('?')[0] + '?type=&page=' + index + '&t='+Date.now()};
}
list;
</js>
